tool.name: PepNovoTag
tool.description: generate short Peptide Sequence Tags (PSTs) from MS/MS spectra file
tool.help:
**Description**
PepNovoTag : Runs PepNovoTag beta3.1 modified (Trapp ions adapted) from peptimapper docker. It generates PTSs files. PepNovoTag output was adapted to be compatible with PepMatch to align PSTs on the genome. PepNovoTag beta3.1 publication : Frank A, Pevzner P: PepNovo: de novo peptide sequencing via probabilistic network modeling. Anal Chem 2005, 77(4):964â€“73. 10.1021/ac048788h.
